remarks: More general version of ~ 3imtr3i .  Useful for converting conditional definitions in a formula.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-1996.)
statement:
3imtr3d.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
3imtr3d.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
3imtr3d.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch <-> ta ) ) $.
3imtr3d $p |- ( ph -> ( th -> ta ) ) $.
